b'Esper Mami: Hoshizora no Dancing Doll': b'Schoolgirl Mami Sakura discovers that she has superpowers. She can sense other people in trouble and teleport to help them, but she keeps her secret double-life hidden from her parents with the help of her schoolfriend, Kazuo Takahata. In this short film, Mami uses her powers to make a puppet show for deprived children. \n\n(Source: Anime Encyclopedia) '
